title: How do I copy files from my phone to a computer?
answer:
l   Use a USB cable to connect your phone to the computer in **Device file manager (MTP)** mode. You can then transmit files between your phone and computer.

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20141204203927621001.png)

Windows Media Player 10 or later is required to use the MTP function.

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20141204203927453002.jpg)
